# shows three different cars all changing lanes on a road, stopping whenever a car pulls in front of
# them
canvas 0 0 600 800
shape background rectangle
motion background 1 0 0 600 800 0 0 0 1 0 0 600 800 0 0 0
shape rect1 rectangle
motion rect1 1 200 50 20 50 255 255 0 1 200 50 20 50 255 255 0
shape rect2 rectangle
motion rect2 1 400 50 20 50 255 255 0 1 400 50 20 50 255 255 0

shape rect3 rectangle
motion rect3 1 200 200 20 50 255 255 0 1 200 200 20 50 255 255 0
shape rect4 rectangle
motion rect4 1 400 150 20 50 255 255 0 1 400 200 20 50 255 255 0

shape rect5 rectangle
motion rect5 1 200 350 20 50 255 255 0 1 200 350 20 50 255 255 0
shape rect6 rectangle
motion rect6 1 400 350 20 50 255 255 0 1 400 350 20 50 255 255 0

shape rect7 rectangle
motion rect7 1 200 500 20 50 255 255 0 1 200 500 20 50 255 255 0
shape rect7 rectangle
motion rect7 1 400 500 20 50 255 255 0 1 400 500 20 50 255 255 0

shape rect8 rectangle
motion rect8 1 200 650 20 50 255 255 0 1 200 650 20 50 255 255 0
shape rect9 rectangle
motion rect9 1 400 650 20 50 255 255 0 1 400 650 20 50 255 255 0



shape car1 plus
motion car1 1 50 -100 100 100 255 0 0 1 50 -100 100 100 255 0 0
shape car2 plus
motion car2 1 260 -100 100 100 70 130 180 1 260 -100 100 100 70 130 180
shape car3 plus
motion car3 1 450 -100 100 100 75 0 130 1 450 -100 100 100 75 0 130


motion car1 1 50 -100 100 100 255 0 0 20 50 50 100 100 255 0 0
motion car1 20 50 50 100 100 255 0 0 40 260 200 100 100 255 0 0
motion car1 40 260 200 100 100 255 0 0 60 50 350 100 100 255 0 0
motion car1 60 50 350 100 100 255 0 0 70 50 400 100 100 255 0 0
motion car1 70 50 400 100 100 255 0 0 100 450 600 100 100 255 0 0
motion car1 100 450 600 100 100 255 0 0 120 450 800 100 100 255 0 0

motion car2 10 260 -100 100 100 70 130 180 23 260 10 100 100 70 130 180
motion car2 40 260 10 100 100 70 130 180 60 450 200 100 100 70 130 180
motion car2 60 450 200 100 100 70 130 180 80 450 400 100 100 70 130 180
motion car2 100 450 400 100 100 70 130 180 125 450 800 100 100 70 130 180

motion car3 1 450 -100 100 100 75 0 130 50 450 300 100 100 75 0 130
motion car3 50 450 300 100 100 75 0 130 72 260 350 100 100 75 0 130
motion car3 87 260 350 100 100 75 0 130 120 260 800 100 100 75 0 130
